title: Red Bull Bolsters Roglič’s Tour de France ‘Super Team’ with Former Ineos Brainiac Dan Bigham
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe brings in former F1 aerodynamicist and track trailblazer Bigham as 'head of engineering' in its quest to top the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Red Bull Bolsters Roglič’s Tour de France ‘Super Team’ with Former Ineos Brainiac Dan Bigham on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
